lender.occupational_info: I use my skills as a lawyer to help the New York City school system preserve and enhance its legal rights to provide the best possible education for millions of children of every ethnic and social background.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: Microfinance has been proven to be a very successful way of giving back to people in need. I feel it gives people an opportunity otherwise not available to succeed and provide for their families.
lender.occupational_info: I am a High School student who has a unique interest in Microfinance. I started a Microfinance club at my High School and am currently the President. Last year (2007-2008) our club composed of 40 members raised $125,000 dollars to loan to poverty stricken people withing the Dominican Republic. Esperanza International, a local MFI provided the infrastructure for us to loan to over 1000+ people to date.

lender.name: Deanna
lender.loan_because: Someone first loaned to me.
lender.occupational_info: Responsible for planning and organizing individual and group activities to meet the social, emotional, spiritual, and intellectual needs of community members. Supports the dignity, privacy, independence, choice and individuality of community members.

lender.name: Troy

lender.occupational_info: I help build online communities.

lender.loan_because: I can

lender.occupational_info: I try to learn as much as I can before I run out of money and have to leave school.

lender.occupational_info: We are a group of students called the G.S.G. representing the students in our K - 8 school.

lender.loan_because: I'm paying it forward.... My brother in law gave me a gift certificate to KIVA. I'm so happy to know about this amazing organization.
lender.occupational_info: I work with children. I offer creative challenges, play and projects all day to a variety of ages!

lender.name: Tony
lender.occupational_info: I'm a writer.

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: My sweet brother, Scott, gave my wife and I KIVA gift certificates, thereby introducing us to this revolution! I can't wait to continue the cycle of paying it forward!!
lender.occupational_info: I currently work in customer service, at a hair salon in Berkeley, CA, USA.

lender.name: Molly
lender.loan_because: I can make a difference!

lender.name: Gwyneth
lender.loan_because: I think that microlending is a great way for ordinary people to make a big difference in a simple way.

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: I want to help others help themselves.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: Jesus Christ cares about those who are in need and I want to show His love in helping to provide money to bring a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student majoring in environmental biology and intercultural studies with a concentration in development.

lender.name: Sloane
lender.loan_because: I know how important these loans are to the people who ask for them. It's inspiring to see people's dreams come true and help be a part of the process.
lender.occupational_info:
I help connect people to nonprofits they can care about and promote giving and volunteering across the profit and nonprofit sector.
Kiva Fellow in the Philippines, Summer 2009.

lender.name: Aatif
lender.loan_because: it's investing in the stocks within the global community with the profit in the form of overall development.
lender.occupational_info: Currently, I do electrical hardware design for mobile "smart" phones. I also work with Engineers Without Borders Canada (www.ewb.ca).

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: the impact of only several hundred dollars is noticeable. I can read about the borrowers and the growth they are able to achieve with a relatively small amount of money.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a major bank for a small department. We lend money to non-profits that build affordable housing. We also buy affordable housing loans from other banks to allow more loans to be made to affordable housing projects.

lender.name: Stephen Lisa and William
lender.loan_because: This seems to be an excellent way to reach out as directly as possible to people in need while encouraging people to learn how to create and add value to their economy.
lender.occupational_info: My work involves reducing human manual labor and increasing efficiency and accuracy in physical addressing, shipping and mailing. When you order something mailed or shipped, it will get to you faster and more reliably if software like my company makes is used to verify address data before anything is shipped or mailed.

lender.name: SUSAN
lender.loan_because: the wealth of the world is poorly distributed. There's plenty for everyone and no one should have to struggle. This is an effective solution that empowers people to pull themselves up.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an accountant. I help businesses keep track of their finances.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: I want the future generations to have a future.

lender.name: Damo

lender.name: Walter
lender.loan_because: Small local business are the bedrock of a stable society

lender.name: Libby
lender.loan_because: It is my mission to help others, especially women, become financially independent.
lender.occupational_info: When a person needs a loan to buy a home, I review all the employment, income, debt, bank assets to determine if they can afford it and fit into the program guidelines for the loan they want. I also help people get credit cards.

lender.loan_because: I believe that we are all one under Christ; therefore, we must take care of one another.

lender.loan_because: this is a pretty good idea, this whole Kiva thing.

lender.name: milosh
lender.loan_because: i am lucky enough to have the opportunity

lender.loan_because: I can make a difference in someone's world today.
